item.description:
Everywhere you look these days, restaurants—even the ones that never catered to the cost-conscious consumer—are creating specials and programs designed to encourage traffic in this otherwise down economy. This is good news for the consumer, and a smart way for restaurants to cater to both their regulars and new guests alike. The only problem? Selecting a restaurant!


Let's get together one last time before everyone travels for the Holidays. My favorite steakhouse is now offering recession dining deals. Monday - Friday Fleming's Steakhouse offers 5.6.7; which means 5 appetizers for $6.00 until 7:00PM. Vegetarians welcome, vegetarian option included on the menu. Join me in the lounge for cheap eats and holiday cheer!

If anyone is up to it, we can go skating on Frog Pond and grab a hot chocolate before the night ends!

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Boston's Best Happy Hour: Fleming's Steakhouse
